mapper.select: select count(item_no) from SHOPUSERITEM where mem_id = #{mem_id}

select ITEM_NO, MEM_ID, TITLE, LINK, IMAGE, LPRICE, MYPRICE, SEQ from (SELECT ITEM_NO, MEM_ID, TITLE, LINK, IMAGE, LPRICE, MYPRICE, ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY ITEM_NO DESC) SEQ FROM SHOPUSERITEM WHERE ITEM_NO > 0 AND MEM_ID = #{mem_id}) where SEQ > #{startSearch} AND SEQ < #{endSearch}
